sqlMap.select:
/*WmsCommonSQL.xml > searchMonthlyStorageRpt*/ SELECT SD.ITEM_CD ,SD.ITEM_NM ,SD.LOT_ID ,SD.STC_QTY ,SD.OUT_QTY ,SD.INBOUND_DT ,SD.OUTBOUND_DT ,SD.STR_FR_DT ,SD.STR_TO_DT ,SD.STR_DAYS ,SR.CTRT_NO ,dbo.TL_GET_CTRT_NM(SR.CTRT_NO) AS CTRT_NM ,SR.WH_CD ,dbo.TL_GET_LOC_NM(SR.WH_CD) AS WH_NM FROM TL_WH_STR_RPT SR ,TL_WH_STR_RPT_DTL SD WHERE SR.CTRT_NO = SD.CTRT_NO AND SR.WH_CD = SD.WH_CD AND SR.RPT_MTH = SD.RPT_MTH AND SR.STS_CD = 'E'
AND SR.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no#
AND SR.WH_CD = #wh_cd#
AND SR.RPT_MTH = SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1,6)

/*WmsCommonSQL.xml > searchMonthlyStorageRptSts*/ SELECT MAX(STS_CD) AS STS_CD FROM TL_WH_STR_RPT WHERE 1=1
AND CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no#
AND WH_CD = #wh_cd#
AND RPT_MTH = SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1,6)
sqlMap.insert: /*WmsCommonSQL.xml > insertMonthlyStorageRpt*/ INSERT INTO TL_WH_STR_RPT( CTRT_NO ,WH_CD ,RPT_MTH ,RPT_FR_DT ,RPT_TO_DT ,STS_CD ,RGST_ID ,RGST_OFC_CD ,RGST_SYS_DT ,RGST_LOC_DT )VALUES( #ctrt_no# ,#wh_cd# ,SUBSTRING( REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1, 6) ,REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') ,REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') ,'S' ,#user_id# ,#ofc_cd# ,GETDATE() ,CONVERT(DATETIME,dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE_DT(#wh_cd#)) )
sqlMap.select: /*searchMonthlyStorageRptDetail*/ SELECT T.CTRT_NO, T.WH_CD, SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1, 6) AS RPT_MTH, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') AS RPT_FR_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') AS RPT_TO_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ T.ITEM_CD, T.ITEM_NM, T.LOT_ID, T.ITEM_SYS_NO, T.IN_QTY, 0 AS STC_QTY, T.OUT_QTY, T.INBOUND_DT, T.OUTBOUND_DT, CASE WHEN T.INBOUND_DT > REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') THEN T.INBOUND_DT ELSE REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') END AS STR_FR_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ ISNULL(T.OUTBOUND_DT, REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '')) AS STR_TO_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ datediff(dd,Convert(DateTime, REPLACE(( CASE WHEN T.INBOUND_DT > REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') THEN T.INBOUND_DT ELSE REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') END ), '-', '')),convert(datetime,ISNULL(T.OUTBOUND_DT, REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '')))) +1 AS STR_DAYS /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE - FR_DATE + 1*/ FROM (SELECT IB.ITEM_SYS_NO, ISNULL(IB.ITEM_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_CD, ISNULL(IB.ITEM_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_NM, ISNULL(IB.LOT_ID, ' ') AS LOT_ID, IB.IN_QTY, OB.OUT_QTY AS OUT_QTY, IB.INBOUND_DT AS INBOUND_DT, OB.OUTBOUND_DT, IB.CTRT_NO, IB.WH_CD FROM (SELECT I.ITEM_SYS_NO, I.LOT_ID, I.CTRT_NO AS CTRT_NO, I.WH_CD AS WH_CD, I.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD, I.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_NM, L.LOT_ATTRIB_01 AS INBOUND_DT, SUM(I.IN_QTY) AS IN_QTY FROM TL_WH_INV_LOT I, TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_LOT L WHERE I.CTRT_NO = L.CTRT_NO AND I.WH_CD = L.WH_CD AND I.ITEM_SYS_NO = L.ITEM_SYS_NO AND I.LOT_ID = L.LOT_ID AND I.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# /* 조회조건 CONTRACT NO*/ AND I.WH_CD = #wh_cd# /* 조회조건 WH CODE*/ AND EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_ALLC A, TL_WH_ISSU S, TL_WH_ISSU_ITEM SI WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = A.WOB_BK_NO AND A.WALC_NO = S.WALC_NO AND S.WOB_OUT_NO = SI.WOB_OUT_NO AND S.OUTBOUND_DT >= REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ AND S.OUTBOUND_DT <= REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ AND SI.WIB_BK_NO = I.WIB_BK_NO AND SI.PO_SYS_NO = I.PO_SYS_NO AND SI.ITEM_SYS_NO = I.ITEM_SYS_NO AND SI.LOT_ID = I.LOT_ID) GROUP BY I.ITEM_SYS_NO, I.LOT_ID, I.CTRT_NO, I.WH_CD, I.ITEM_CD, I.ITEM_NM, L.LOT_ATTRIB_01 ) IB, (SELECT OC.ITEM_SYS_NO, OC.LOT_ID, MAX(OC.CTRT_NO) AS CTRT_NO, MAX(OC.WH_CD) AS WH_CD, MAX(ITEM_CD) AS ITEM_CD, MAX(ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_01) AS INBOUND_DT, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_02) AS LOT_NO, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_03) AS EXP_DT, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_04) AS LOT_04, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_05) AS LOT_05, MAX(OUTBOUND_DT) AS OUTBOUND_DT, SUM(OUT_QTY) AS OUT_QTY FROM (SELECT SI.WOB_BK_NO, SI.PO_SYS_NO, SI.ITEM_SYS_NO, SI.LOT_ID, B.CTRT_NO, B.WH_CD, SI.WH_LOC_CD, SI.ITEM_SEQ, SI.WIB_BK_NO, SI.ITEM_CD, SI.ITEM_NM, SI.ISSU_ITEM_EA_QTY AS OUT_QTY, S.OUTBOUND_DT FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_ISSU S, TL_WH_ISSU_ITEM SI WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = SI.WOB_BK_NO AND S.WOB_OUT_NO = SI.WOB_OUT_NO AND B.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# /* 조회 조건 Contract No*/ AND B.WH_CD = #wh_cd# /* 조회 조건 WH CODE*/ ) OC, TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_LOT L WHERE OC.CTRT_NO = L.CTRT_NO AND OC.WH_CD = L.WH_CD AND OC.ITEM_SYS_NO = L.ITEM_SYS_NO AND OC.LOT_ID = L.LOT_ID GROUP BY OC.ITEM_SYS_NO, OC.LOT_ID, OC.OUTBOUND_DT ) OB WHERE IB.ITEM_SYS_NO = OB.ITEM_SYS_NO AND IB.LOT_ID = OB.LOT_ID ) T WHERE 1 = 1 AND T.OUTBOUND_DT >= REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ AND T.OUTBOUND_DT <= REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ ORDER BY ITEM_SYS_NO, LOT_ID, OUTBOUND_DT

/* 해당 기간 현재고 */ SELECT CT.CTRT_NO, CT.WH_CD, SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1, 6) AS RPT_MTH, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') AS RPT_FR_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') AS RPT_TO_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ CT.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD, CT.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_NM, CT.LOT_ID, CT.ITEM_SYS_NO, CT.IN_QTY, CT.IN_QTY - ISNULL(CT.OUT_QTY, 0) AS STC_QTY, 0 AS OUT_QTY, CT.INBOUND_DT AS INBOUND_DT, '' AS OUTBOUND_DT, CASE WHEN CT.INBOUND_DT > REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') THEN CT.INBOUND_DT ELSE REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') END AS STR_FR_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') AS STR_TO_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ datediff(dd,Convert(DateTime, ( CASE WHEN CT.INBOUND_DT > REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') THEN CT.INBOUND_DT ELSE REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') END )),convert(datetime,REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''))) +1 AS STR_DAYS /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE - FR_DATE + 1*/ FROM (SELECT I.CTRT_NO, I.WH_CD, I.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD, I.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_NM, I.ITEM_SYS_NO, I.LOT_ID, SUM(I.IN_QTY) AS IN_QTY, MAX(S.OUT_QTY) AS OUT_QTY, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_01) AS INBOUND_DT FROM TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_LOT L, TL_WH_INV_LOT I LEFT JOIN (SELECT B1.CTRT_NO, B1.WH_CD, S2.ITEM_SYS_NO, S2.LOT_ID, SUM(S2.ISSU_ITEM_EA_QTY) AS OUT_QTY FROM TL_WH_OB B1, TL_WH_ALLC A1, TL_WH_ISSU S1, TL_WH_ISSU_ITEM S2 WHERE B1.WOB_BK_NO = A1.WOB_BK_NO AND A1.WALC_NO = S1.WALC_NO AND S1.WOB_OUT_NO = S2.WOB_OUT_NO AND S1.OUTBOUND_DT <= REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') AND B1.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# /* 조회조건 CONTRACT NO*/ AND B1.WH_CD = #wh_cd# /* 조회조건 WH CODE*/ GROUP BY B1.CTRT_NO, B1.WH_CD, S2.ITEM_SYS_NO, S2.LOT_ID) S ON I.CTRT_NO = S.CTRT_NO AND I.WH_CD = S.WH_CD AND I.ITEM_SYS_NO = S.ITEM_SYS_NO AND I.LOT_ID = S.LOT_ID WHERE I.CTRT_NO = L.CTRT_NO AND I.WH_CD = L.WH_CD AND I.ITEM_SYS_NO = L.ITEM_SYS_NO AND I.LOT_ID = L.LOT_ID AND I.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# /* 조회조건 CONTRACT NO*/ AND I.WH_CD = #wh_cd# /* 조회조건 WH CODE*/ AND L.LOT_ATTRIB_01 <= REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ GROUP BY I.CTRT_NO, I.WH_CD, I.ITEM_CD, I.ITEM_NM, I.LOT_ID, I.ITEM_SYS_NO) CT WHERE 1 = 1 AND CT.IN_QTY - ISNULL(CT.OUT_QTY, 0) > 0 ORDER BY ITEM_CD, ITEM_NM, LOT_ID, INBOUND_DT, OUTBOUND_DT

/*searchMonthlyStorageRptDetail*/ SELECT T.CTRT_NO, T.WH_CD, SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1, 6) AS RPT_MTH, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') AS RPT_FR_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') AS RPT_TO_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ T.ITEM_CD, T.ITEM_NM, T.LOT_ID, T.ITEM_SYS_NO, T.IN_QTY, 0 AS STC_QTY, T.OUT_QTY, T.INBOUND_DT, T.OUTBOUND_DT, CASE WHEN T.INBOUND_DT > REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') THEN T.INBOUND_DT ELSE REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') END AS STR_FR_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ ISNULL(T.OUTBOUND_DT, REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '')) AS STR_TO_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ CONVERT(INT,ISNULL(T.OUTBOUND_DT, REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '')), 112) - CONVERT(INT,REPLACE(( CASE WHEN T.INBOUND_DT > REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') THEN T.INBOUND_DT ELSE REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') END ), '-', ''), 112) + 1 AS STR_DAYS /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE - FR_DATE + 1 */
FROM (SELECT IB.ITEM_SYS_NO, ISNULL(IB.ITEM_CD, ' ') AS ITEM_CD, ISNULL(IB.ITEM_NM, ' ') AS ITEM_NM, ISNULL(IB.LOT_ID, ' ') AS LOT_ID, IB.IN_QTY, OB.OUT_QTY AS OUT_QTY, IB.INBOUND_DT AS INBOUND_DT, OB.OUTBOUND_DT, IB.CTRT_NO, IB.WH_CD FROM (SELECT I.ITEM_SYS_NO, I.LOT_ID, I.CTRT_NO AS CTRT_NO, I.WH_CD AS WH_CD, I.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD, I.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_NM, L.LOT_ATTRIB_01 AS INBOUND_DT, SUM(I.IN_QTY) AS IN_QTY FROM TL_WH_INV_LOT I, TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_LOT L WHERE I.CTRT_NO = L.CTRT_NO AND I.WH_CD = L.WH_CD AND I.ITEM_SYS_NO = L.ITEM_SYS_NO AND I.LOT_ID = L.LOT_ID AND I.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# /* 조회조건 CONTRACT NO*/ AND I.WH_CD = #wh_cd# /* 조회조건 WH CODE*/ AND EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_ALLC A, TL_WH_ISSU S, TL_WH_ISSU_ITEM SI WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = A.WOB_BK_NO AND A.WALC_NO = S.WALC_NO AND S.WOB_OUT_NO = SI.WOB_OUT_NO AND S.OUTBOUND_DT >= REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ AND S.OUTBOUND_DT <= REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ AND SI.WIB_BK_NO = I.WIB_BK_NO AND SI.PO_SYS_NO = I.PO_SYS_NO AND SI.ITEM_SYS_NO = I.ITEM_SYS_NO AND SI.LOT_ID = I.LOT_ID) GROUP BY I.ITEM_SYS_NO, I.LOT_ID, I.CTRT_NO, I.WH_CD, I.ITEM_CD, I.ITEM_NM, L.LOT_ATTRIB_01 ) IB, (SELECT OC.ITEM_SYS_NO, OC.LOT_ID, MAX(OC.CTRT_NO) AS CTRT_NO, MAX(OC.WH_CD) AS WH_CD, MAX(ITEM_CD) AS ITEM_CD, MAX(ITEM_NM) AS ITEM_NM, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_01) AS INBOUND_DT, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_02) AS LOT_NO, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_03) AS EXP_DT, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_04) AS LOT_04, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_05) AS LOT_05, MAX(OUTBOUND_DT) AS OUTBOUND_DT, SUM(OUT_QTY) AS OUT_QTY FROM (SELECT SI.WOB_BK_NO, SI.PO_SYS_NO, SI.ITEM_SYS_NO, SI.LOT_ID, B.CTRT_NO, B.WH_CD, SI.WH_LOC_CD, SI.ITEM_SEQ, SI.WIB_BK_NO, SI.ITEM_CD, SI.ITEM_NM, SI.ISSU_ITEM_EA_QTY AS OUT_QTY, S.OUTBOUND_DT FROM TL_WH_OB B, TL_WH_ISSU S, TL_WH_ISSU_ITEM SI WHERE B.WOB_BK_NO = SI.WOB_BK_NO AND S.WOB_OUT_NO = SI.WOB_OUT_NO AND B.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# /* 조회 조건 Contract No*/ AND B.WH_CD = #wh_cd# /* 조회 조건 WH CODE*/ ) OC, TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_LOT L WHERE OC.CTRT_NO = L.CTRT_NO AND OC.WH_CD = L.WH_CD AND OC.ITEM_SYS_NO = L.ITEM_SYS_NO AND OC.LOT_ID = L.LOT_ID GROUP BY OC.ITEM_SYS_NO, OC.LOT_ID, OC.OUTBOUND_DT ) OB WHERE IB.ITEM_SYS_NO = OB.ITEM_SYS_NO AND IB.LOT_ID = OB.LOT_ID ) T WHERE 1 = 1 AND T.OUTBOUND_DT >= REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ AND T.OUTBOUND_DT <= REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ ORDER BY ITEM_SYS_NO, LOT_ID, OUTBOUND_DT

/* 해당 기간 현재고 */ SELECT CT.CTRT_NO, CT.WH_CD, SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1, 6) AS RPT_MTH, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') AS RPT_FR_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') AS RPT_TO_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ CT.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD, CT.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_NM, CT.LOT_ID, CT.ITEM_SYS_NO, CT.IN_QTY, CT.IN_QTY - ISNULL(CT.OUT_QTY, 0) AS STC_QTY, 0 AS OUT_QTY, CT.INBOUND_DT AS INBOUND_DT, '' AS OUTBOUND_DT, CASE WHEN CT.INBOUND_DT > REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') THEN CT.INBOUND_DT ELSE REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') END AS STR_FR_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY FR_DATE*/ REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') AS STR_TO_DT, /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ CONVERT(INT,REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 112) - CONVERT(INT,( CASE WHEN CT.INBOUND_DT > REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') THEN CT.INBOUND_DT ELSE REPLACE(#rpt_fr_dt#, '-', '') END ), 112) + 1 AS STR_DAYS /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE - FR_DATE + 1*/ FROM (SELECT I.CTRT_NO, I.WH_CD, I.ITEM_CD AS ITEM_CD, I.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_NM, I.ITEM_SYS_NO, I.LOT_ID, SUM(I.IN_QTY) AS IN_QTY, MAX(S.OUT_QTY) AS OUT_QTY, MAX(L.LOT_ATTRIB_01) AS INBOUND_DT FROM TL_CTRT_CUST_ITEM_LOT L, TL_WH_INV_LOT I LEFT JOIN (SELECT B1.CTRT_NO, B1.WH_CD, S2.ITEM_SYS_NO, S2.LOT_ID, SUM(S2.ISSU_ITEM_EA_QTY) AS OUT_QTY FROM TL_WH_OB B1, TL_WH_ALLC A1, TL_WH_ISSU S1, TL_WH_ISSU_ITEM S2 WHERE B1.WOB_BK_NO = A1.WOB_BK_NO AND A1.WALC_NO = S1.WALC_NO AND S1.WOB_OUT_NO = S2.WOB_OUT_NO AND S1.OUTBOUND_DT <= REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') AND B1.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# /* 조회조건 CONTRACT NO*/ AND B1.WH_CD = #wh_cd# /* 조회조건 WH CODE*/ GROUP BY B1.CTRT_NO, B1.WH_CD, S2.ITEM_SYS_NO, S2.LOT_ID) S ON I.CTRT_NO = S.CTRT_NO AND I.WH_CD = S.WH_CD AND I.ITEM_SYS_NO = S.ITEM_SYS_NO AND I.LOT_ID = S.LOT_ID WHERE I.CTRT_NO = L.CTRT_NO AND I.WH_CD = L.WH_CD AND I.ITEM_SYS_NO = L.ITEM_SYS_NO AND I.LOT_ID = L.LOT_ID AND I.CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# /* 조회조건 CONTRACT NO*/ AND I.WH_CD = #wh_cd# /* 조회조건 WH CODE*/ AND L.LOT_ATTRIB_01 <= REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', '') /* 조회조건 MONTHLY TO_DATE*/ GROUP BY I.CTRT_NO, I.WH_CD, I.ITEM_CD, I.ITEM_NM, I.LOT_ID, I.ITEM_SYS_NO) CT WHERE 1 = 1 AND CT.IN_QTY - ISNULL(CT.OUT_QTY, 0) > 0 ORDER BY ITEM_CD, ITEM_NM, LOT_ID, INBOUND_DT, OUTBOUND_DT
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TL_WH_STR_RPT_DTL( CTRT_NO ,WH_CD ,RPT_MTH ,RPT_SEQ ,ITEM_CD ,ITEM_NM ,LOT_ID ,STC_QTY ,OUT_QTY ,INBOUND_DT ,OUTBOUND_DT ,STR_FR_DT ,STR_TO_DT ,STR_DAYS ,RGST_ID ,RGST_SYS_DT ,RGST_LOC_DT )VALUES( #ctrt_no# ,#wh_cd# ,#rpt_mth# ,(SELECT ISNULL(MAX(RPT_SEQ),0)+1 FROM TL_WH_STR_RPT_DTL WHERE CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# AND WH_CD = #wh_cd# AND RPT_MTH = #rpt_mth#) ,#item_cd# ,#item_nm# ,#lot_id# ,#stc_qty# ,#out_qty# ,#inbound_dt# ,#outbound_dt# ,#str_fr_dt# ,#str_to_dt# ,#str_days# ,#user_id# ,GETDATE() ,CONVERT(DATETIME,dbo.TL_GET_TM_ZONE_DATE_DT(#wh_cd#)) )
sqlMap.delete: /*WmsCommonSQL.xml > deleteMonthlyStorageRptDetail*/ DELETE FROM TL_WH_STR_RPT_DTL WHERE CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# AND WH_CD = #wh_cd# AND RPT_MTH = SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1,6)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TL_WH_STR_RPT SET STS_CD = 'E' WHERE CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# AND WH_CD = #wh_cd# AND RPT_MTH = SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1,6)
UPDATE TL_WH_STR_RPT SET STS_CD = 'X' WHERE CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# AND WH_CD = #wh_cd# AND RPT_MTH = SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1,6)
sqlMap.delete: /*WmsCommonSQL.xml > deleteMonthlyStorageRpt*/ DELETE FROM TL_WH_STR_RPT WHERE CTRT_NO = #ctrt_no# AND WH_CD = #wh_cd# AND RPT_MTH = SUBSTRING(REPLACE(#rpt_to_dt#, '-', ''), 1,6)
